channel.title: Hello, I'm Donny
channel.description:
Hello,
My name is Donny and I'm a geek.
Been involved with computers for ages. Always interested on the technical side of things and start-ups. Developed own iOS apps, lots of unfinished web apps, and just started doing (developing, marketing, etc) my own small SaaS app.
Anyway, great to meet you all :smile:
Cheers, Donny

item.title: Hello, I'm Donny
item.dc:creator: Richard
item.description:
Hi Donny! I’m pretty new here as well. Jump in

Read full topic
